Package com.analyzer.sniffer

Class Sniffer

java.lang.Object
com.analyzer.sniffer.Sniffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
HashtagSniffer, MainTextContentSniffer
public abstract class Sniffer
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract Sniffer class with csv inputs used to implement String based searches.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • findTrend

      public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> findTrend​(int numOfResultsToFind) throws java.io.IOException
      Returns a list of trend results according to users top posts.

      This implementation specific method analyzes the top user posts. It then will determine useful information for the user to know and returns a list of Strings as a result for future output.

      Parameters:
      numOfResultsToFind - the maximum number of results to find
      Returns:
      the list of String results
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      See Also:
      List
